description._content: Collection: Earth Day Image Gallery Title: TIROS' First Look Creator: NASA Description: The first photo of Earth from a weather satellite, taken by the TIROS-1 satellite on April 1, 1960. Early photographs provided new information on cloud systems, including spiral formations associated with large storms, immediately proving their value to meteorologists. Date: 4/2/09 Source: www.archive.org/details/324271main_tiros_full SOURCE: nasaimages.org/luna/servlet/detail/NVA2~62~62~78734~135599 Visit www.nasaimages.org for the most comprehensive compilation of NASA stills, film and video, created in partnership with Internet Archive.
